name: whatify
description: An application which makes it possible to manage spotify via whatsapp.

scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "./node_modules/.bin/nodemon index.js -i client -e js" "./node_modules/.bin/nodemon --exec python ./backend/whatsapp_web_backend.py -i client -e py" "sass --watch client/css/main.scss:client/css/main.css"
scripts.win: concurrently --kill-others "node_modules\.bin\nodemon index.js -i client -e js" "node_modules\.bin\nodemon --exec python ./backend/whatsapp_web_backend.py -i client -e py" "sass --watch client/css/main.scss:client/css/main.css"

author: sigalor
